name: Way of Shadow
description: Monks of the Way of Shadow use stealth, darkness, and silence to strike unseen and vanish without a trace.

3.name: Shadow Arts
3.description: You can spend ki to cast illusion and darkness-themed spells.

6.name: Shadow Step
6.description: You teleport between shadows and gain advantage on your next attack.

11.name: Cloak of Shadows
11.description: You can become invisible while in dim light or darkness.

17.name: Opportunist
17.description: You can make a reaction attack when a nearby creature is hit.
